title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2046/85 of 24 July 1985 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1985/74 laying down detailed rules of application for the fixing of reference prices and free-at-frontier prices for carp
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2046/85
of 24 July 1985
amending Regulation (EEC) No 1985/74 laying down detailed rules of application for the fixing of reference prices and free-at-frontier prices for carp
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 3 of Regulation (EEC) No 1985/74 is replaced by the following:
'A reference price shall be fixed for carp for the periods running:
- from 1 August to 30 November,
- from 1 December to 31 December,
- from 1 January to 31 July.'

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 August 1985.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 July 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
